requirement: This code is intended to implement an elevator door control system that manages door opening and closing processes based on arrival at the target floor and door sensor states.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_ElevatorDoorController
VAR_INPUT
	bArrivedAtTarget	:	BOOL;		// 到达目标楼层
	bDoorClosed			:	BOOL;		// 门已关闭传感器
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	bOpenDoor			:	BOOL;		// 开门命令
	bCloseDoor			:	BOOL;		// 关门命令
	bDoorOpen			:	BOOL;		// 门打开状态
	bDoorReady			:	BOOL;		// 门准备好（可以移动）
END_VAR
